title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practice Competencies: Elementary Mathematics Problem-Solving Skills Using Flip Character Manipulatives

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational skills and experience with simple problem-solving
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply a step-by-step problem-solving strategy (analysis-planning-execution-review) with 80% accuracy through flap-based tasks within four weeks.
Learners can independently solve real-world job-linked math problems (e.g., medical calculations, technical drawing interpretation) presented in VR simulations with 75% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate a two-level or higher improvement in critical thinking skills through formative assessment analysis of problem-solving logs (flap activity logs).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
